# iosxr_ipsla (Data Source)

This data source can read the IPSLA configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_ipsla" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `key_chain` (String) Use MD5 authentication for IPSLA control message
- `low_memory` (Number) Configure low memory water mark (default 20M)
- `operations` (Attributes List) Operation number (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--operations))
- `schedules` (Attributes List) Specify an operation (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--schedules))

<a id="nestedatt--operations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `operations`

Read-Only:

- `icmp_echo` (Boolean) ICMP echo operation type
- `icmp_echo_datasize_request` (Number) Enter request datasize in byte
- `icmp_echo_destination_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the target device
- `icmp_echo_destination_ipv6` (String) Enter IPv6 address of the target device
- `icmp_echo_frequency` (Number) Frequency of the probing
- `icmp_echo_history_buckets` (Number) Buckets of history kept
- `icmp_echo_history_filter_all` (Boolean) Store history data for all operations
- `icmp_echo_history_filter_failures` (Boolean) Store data for operations that failed
- `icmp_echo_history_lives` (Number) Lives of history kept
- `icmp_echo_source_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the source device
- `icmp_echo_source_ipv6` (String) Enter IPv6 address of the source device
- `icmp_echo_statistics_hourly_buckets` (Number) Number of Hours for which statistics are kept
- `icmp_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_count` (Number) Count of distribution intervals maintained
- `icmp_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_interval` (Number) Time interval for each statistical distribution
- `icmp_echo_statistics_intervals` (Attributes List) Statistics collection over specified time interval (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--operations--icmp_echo_statistics_intervals))
- `icmp_echo_tag` (String) Add a tag for this operation
- `icmp_echo_timeout` (Number) Probe timeout interval
- `icmp_echo_tos` (Number) Type of service setting in probe packet
- `icmp_echo_vrf` (String) Configure IPSLA for a VPN Routing/Forwarding instance

<a id="nestedatt--schedules"></a>
### Nested Schema for `schedules`

Read-Only:

- `ageout` (Number) How long to keep this entry after it becomes inactive
- `life_forever` (Boolean) Schedule operation to run indefinitely
- `life_time` (Number) Life in seconds. (default 3600 seconds)
- `operation_number` (Number) Specify an operation
- `recurring` (Boolean) probe to be scheduled automatically every day
- `start_after_hour` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
- `start_after_minute` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
- `start_after_second` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
- `start_day_of_month` (Number) Day of the month
- `start_hour` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
- `start_minute` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
- `start_month` (String) Month of the year
- `start_now` (Boolean) Schedule operation now
- `start_pending` (Boolean) Keep operation in the pending state
- `start_second` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
- `start_year` (Number) Year
